segments.text: Observing this kitchen, the woman is totally zoned in on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her is running over with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't react at all, just keeps drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, a boy is on a stool by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open, and he's pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wow, the stool is really leaning back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm up waiting for hers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is calm and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in this setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress make her look so proper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water damage is going unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn chaotic any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The divided window panes frame it all nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR
